explains: n. 绅士；假绅士；男子；男厕

sentences.en: He was a lean, patrician gent in his early sixties.
sentences.cn: 他60岁出头时曾是一位有着贵族气派的清瘦绅士。

sentences.en: Mr. Blake was a gent. He knew how to behave.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生是位绅士，他知道该怎样行事。

sentences.en: They were created by Belgian studio Coming Soon for the Gent Scheppende Stad (Ghent Creative City).
sentences.cn: 这些是由一家比利时的工作室“新鲜出炉”为根特创意城打造的。
